heroSubtitle: Indulge in a symphony of flavors crafted with passion and the finest ingredients.
serviceFineDiningDesc: Exquisite dishes prepared by world-class chefs.
servicePrivateEventsDesc: Host your special occasions in our elegant spaces.
serviceCateringDesc: Bring The Golden Spoon experience to your location.
promotionPastaNightDesc: Enjoy 2-for-1 on all pasta dishes every Tuesday!
contactSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you. For reservations, please use our booking page.
footerSlogan: Savor the Moment, Taste the Perfection.
footerRights: © {year} The Golden Spoon. All rights reserved.
menuNoItems: No items available for this category at the moment.
supaZeamaDesc: Traditional Moldovan chicken noodle soup, light and flavorful, with homemade noodles.
supaCiorbaBurtaDesc: Hearty and sour tripe soup, a beloved classic, often served with garlic and chili.
supaGalusteDesc: Clear chicken or beef soup with fluffy semolina dumplings.
supaCiuperciDesc: Creamy mushroom soup made with wild or cultivated mushrooms and fresh herbs.
mainMamaligaName: Mămăligă cu brânză și smântână (Polenta with Cheese & Sour Cream)
mainMamaligaDesc: Warm polenta served with traditional Moldovan sheep cheese and rich sour cream.
mainSarmaleDesc: Cabbage or vine leaves stuffed with a mix of minced meat (pork, beef) and rice, slow-cooked and served with sour cream.
mainChifteleName: Chifteluțe cu piure (Meatballs with Mashed Potatoes)
mainChifteleDesc: Flavorful Moldovan meatballs (pârjoale) served with creamy mashed potatoes and often a tomato sauce.
mainArdeiUmplutiDesc: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of rice, minced meat, and vegetables, baked in tomato sauce.
mainPestePrajitName: Pește prăjit cu mămăliguță (Fried Fish with Polenta)
mainPestePrajitDesc: Freshwater fish (usually carp or trout) fried crispy, served alongside polenta and garlic sauce (mujdei).
mainTocanaDesc: Slow-cooked pork stew with onions, garlic, paprika, and a rich sauce, traditionally accompanied by polenta.
placinteBranzaDesc: Traditional Moldovan thin, flaky dough pies filled with salty cow or sheep cheese, sometimes with dill.
placinteCartofiDesc: Savory pies filled with mashed potatoes, onions, and sometimes bacon or herbs.
placinteVarzaDesc: Delicious pies filled with sautéed cabbage, seasoned with dill and pepper.
placinteDovleacDesc: Sweet pies filled with spiced pumpkin puree, often with cinnamon and sugar, a seasonal favorite.
desertCusmaGugutaDesc: Iconic Moldovan cake made of rolled crepes filled with sour cherries, stacked in a pyramid ('hat') and covered with sour cream frosting.
desertPruneUmpluteName: Prune uscate umplute cu nuci (Dried Plums Stuffed with Walnuts)
desertPruneUmpluteDesc: Dried plums, pitted and stuffed with walnut kernels, often simmered in a light syrup or served with cream.
desertCozonacDesc: Traditional leavened sweet bread, usually baked for holidays, with fillings like walnut paste, poppy seeds, or Turkish delight.
desertBabaNeagraDesc: A unique, dark, moist, and slightly caramelized cake made with kefir, sugar, and baking soda, slow-baked at low heat.
bauturaCompotDesc: Homemade stewed fruit drink, made from various fruits like cherries, apples, plums, or apricots, served chilled or warm.
bauturaVinCasaDesc: Traditional Moldovan homemade red or white wine, often robust and full-bodied.
bauturaMustDesc: Freshly pressed, unfermented grape juice, available during grape harvest season, sweet and cloudy.
bauturaCeaiPlanteDesc: Tea made from local medicinal herbs like linden flowers, mint, St. John's wort, or chamomile.
bookingPageSubtitle: Secure your spot for an unforgettable dining experience. Select your preferred date, time, and number of guests.
bookingConfirmationMessage: Your table for {{guests}} guests on {{date}} at {{time}} (Table {{tableId}}) is confirmed. We look forward to welcoming you!
bookingConfirmationMessageNoTable: Your table for {{guests}} guests on {{date}} at {{time}} is confirmed. We look forward to welcoming you!
bookingErrorNoTables: Sorry, no tables available for the selected criteria. Please try a different time or party size.
bookingErrorSelectTable: Please select an available table on the map.
bookingErrorGeneral: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
bookingErrorSelectedTableUnavailable: The previously selected table is no longer available or suitable. Please choose another.
bookingErrorTableBooked: This table is already booked. Please select another.
bookingErrorTableTooSmall: This table is too small for your party. Please select a larger table or reduce party size.
bookingErrorDateTimeFirst: Please select date and time first to see table availability.
validationErrorEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validationErrorPhone: Please enter a valid phone number.
validationErrorGuests: Number of guests must be between 1 and 20.
aboutPageSubtitle: Crafting memories, one dish at a time.
aboutSection1Content: Founded in 1998, The Golden Spoon began as a humble bistro with a dream: to bring authentic, high-quality cuisine to our community. Our founder, Chef Antoine Dubois, envisioned a place where every meal is a celebration, and every guest feels like family. Over the years, we've grown, but our core values of passion, quality, and hospitality have remained unchanged.
aboutSection2Content: We believe that the best dishes start with the finest ingredients. That's why we partner with local farmers and purveyors to source fresh, seasonal produce, sustainable seafood, and premium meats. Our chefs meticulously craft each dish, blending traditional techniques with modern culinary innovation to create a truly unique dining experience.
messageSentError: Error sending message. Please try again.
menuConstructorSubtitle: Select one or more items for each course to personalize your dining experience.
menuConstructorMealSaved: Your meal preference has been saved!
menuConstructorSelectAtLeastOnePrompt: Please select at least one item for your meal.
menuConstructorNoItemsForCourse: No items available for this course.
downloadPNGSuccessDesc: Your personalized meal image has been downloaded.
downloadPDFSuccessDesc: Your personalized meal PDF has been downloaded.
downloadPNGErrorDesc: Could not generate PNG. Please try again.
downloadPDFErrorDesc: Could not generate PDF. Please try again.
menuPageSelectCategoryPrompt: Please select a category above to view our delicious offerings!
tableLayoutDisabledPrompt: Please enter date, time, and guest count to see available tables.
bookingConfirmationDialogSubtitle: Your table is waiting! Here are your reservation details:
contactRestaurantDialogSubtitle: Your meal preference for booking {{bookingId}} is saved. Please contact us to confirm any special arrangements.
contactRestaurantDialogInstructions: You can download your meal summary below. When contacting us, please mention your booking ID.
adminReservationsSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, phone, ID...
adminReservationsTableCaption: A list of current and past reservations.
adminTableLayoutDesc: Configure your restaurant's seating arrangement. Drag and drop tables, set capacities, and define table types.
adminTableLayoutDeletePrompt: Are you sure you want to delete table {{tableId}}?
adminAvailabilityDesc: Set your restaurant's operating hours, special closures, and manage overall availability for online bookings.
adminMenuEditorSavedAllDesc: All categories and menu items have been saved to local storage.
adminMenuEditorCategoryDeletedDesc: Category {{categoryId}} and its items have been deleted.
adminContactSubmissionsDesc: View messages sent through your website's contact form.
adminBlogEventPageDesc: Create, edit, and manage your restaurant's blog articles and event announcements.
adminBlogEventFormImageHelp: Provide descriptive text (e.g., 'restaurant_gala_event'). The system will find a relevant image.
adminBlogEventNoPosts: No blog posts or events found. Click 'Add New' to create one.
eventsPageSubtitle: Stay updated with our latest happenings, promotions, and stories.
eventsNoPosts: No news or events to display at the moment. Check back soon!
menuPageChooseEventMenuDesc: Select from our curated menus for special occasions.
menuPageBuildCustomMenuDesc: Create your own personalized dining experience.
menuPageSelectPriceVariantPrompt: Select a price option for your event.
eventMenuErrorDesc: Please select one item from each group.
eventMenuGuidanceTitle: How to Select Your Event Menu
eventMenuGuidanceDesc: For this event menu, please select one item from each section (e.g., one appetizer, one main course). The total price per person remains fixed at ${{price}}.
eventMenuWeddingDesc: Curated menus designed to make your special day unforgettable. Choose a package that suits your taste and budget.
eventMenuWeddingSilverDesc: An elegant selection of classic dishes, perfect for a memorable celebration.
eventMenuWeddingGoldDesc: A premium offering with expanded choices and gourmet preparations for an exquisite experience.
eventMenuBirthdayDesc: Celebrate another year with our festive and delicious birthday menu packages.
eventMenuBirthdayClassicDesc: A joyful mix of popular dishes to make any birthday special.
eventMenuCorporateDesc: Professional and refined menus for your business meetings, conferences, or corporate events.
eventMenuCorporateLunchDesc: A balanced and sophisticated lunch menu perfect for productive meetings.
ourServicesMainSubtitle: At The Golden Spoon, we specialize in turning your special occasions into cherished memories. Explore our tailored services designed for elegance, joy, and unforgettable culinary experiences.
ourServicesWeddingsDesc: Celebrate your most special day in an ambiance of elegance and charm. Our team is dedicated to creating unforgettable wedding receptions with exquisite menus and impeccable service. Let us turn your dream wedding into a reality.
ourServicesAnniversariesDesc: Mark your milestones with a memorable dining experience. Whether it’s an intimate dinner or a grand celebration, we offer personalized service and delectable cuisine to make your anniversary truly special.
ourServicesChristeningsDesc: Welcome your little one with a heartwarming celebration. Our versatile spaces and family-friendly atmosphere are perfect for christenings, providing a delightful experience for all your guests with traditional and modern culinary delights.
weddingsPageSubtitle: Crafting your perfect day with elegance, exquisite cuisine, and impeccable service at The Golden Spoon.
weddingsPageDetailsPara1: At The Golden Spoon, we understand that your wedding day is one of the most important moments of your life. Our dedicated event planning team works closely with you to bring your vision to life, ensuring every detail is meticulously arranged, from custom menus to stunning decor.
weddingsPageDetailsPara2: Choose from our elegant event spaces, each offering a unique ambiance. Our chefs specialize in creating memorable culinary experiences, using the freshest ingredients to craft dishes that will delight your guests. Let us handle the complexities, so you can focus on celebrating your love.
weddingsPageDetailsImageAlt: Happy couple at their wedding reception
weddingsPageTestimonial1Quote: Our wedding at The Golden Spoon was a dream come true! The food, service, and ambiance were beyond perfect. Highly recommended!
weddingsPageTestimonial2Quote: The team handled every detail flawlessly. Our guests are still raving about the delicious menu. Thank you for making our day so special!
weddingsPageFinalCTATitle: Ready to Plan Your Perfect Wedding?
weddingsPageFinalCTASubtitle: Contact us today to discuss your dream wedding and let our experts help you create an unforgettable celebration.
anniversariesPageSubtitle: Celebrate your milestones with elegance and unforgettable flavors at The Golden Spoon.
anniversariesPageDetailsPara1: Every anniversary is a testament to enduring love and partnership. At The Golden Spoon, we provide the perfect setting to honor these special moments. Whether you're planning an intimate dinner for two or a larger gathering with family and friends, our team is here to make your celebration exceptional.
anniversariesPageDetailsPara2: Enjoy personalized service, a curated selection of fine wines, and a menu that can be tailored to your preferences. Our elegant private dining options offer exclusivity and comfort, ensuring your anniversary is both memorable and magical.
anniversariesPageFeature2: Menus adaptable for couples or groups
anniversariesPageFeature3: Special touches to personalize your celebration
anniversariesPageDetailsImageAlt: Couple enjoying a romantic anniversary meal
anniversariesPageTestimonial1Quote: The Golden Spoon made our 10th anniversary so special. The private dining room was perfect, and the food was exceptional!
anniversariesPageTestimonial2Quote: We celebrated our parents' 50th here, and it was a night to remember. The staff went above and beyond. Thank you!
anniversariesPageFinalCTASubtitle: Let us help you create the perfect atmosphere for your special anniversary. Contact us to plan your celebration.
christeningsPageSubtitle: Celebrate your little one's special day with a heartwarming gathering at The Golden Spoon.
christeningsPageDetailsTitle: A Warm Welcome for Your Little One
christeningsPageDetailsPara1: A christening or cumătrie is a cherished family occasion. At The Golden Spoon, we offer a warm, welcoming atmosphere perfect for celebrating this significant milestone. Our versatile event spaces can be adapted to suit your party size and style, ensuring a comfortable and joyous gathering for all your loved ones.
christeningsPageDetailsPara2: Our culinary team can create delightful menus that appeal to both adults and children, incorporating traditional flavors or contemporary dishes as you prefer. We pay attention to every detail, from decorations to entertainment options, to make your child's christening a beautiful and stress-free event.
christeningsPageDetailsImageAlt: Family gathered for a christening celebration
christeningsPageTestimonial1Quote: The Golden Spoon hosted our son's christening, and it was wonderful. The space was perfect for families, and the food was loved by all ages!
christeningsPageTestimonial2Quote: We couldn't have asked for a better place for our daughter's cumătrie. The staff were so accommodating and helpful. Everything was perfect.
christeningsPageFinalCTASubtitle: Let us help you celebrate this special milestone. Contact us to learn more about our christening and cumătrie packages.
